description:
Tosan Suusu wishes to become a fully fledged fox spirit. However, to balance out the face that Suusu is not incredibly beautiful or intelligent like the rest of her clan, she is urged by her older sister, Tosan Yaya, to agree to an arranged marriage. Not willing to go along with her sister`s plans, Suusu runs away and winds up stumbling onto the set of a matchmaking television show. There she encounters a young man, Haku Gessho, who agrees to help her with her matchmaking assignment for a price. Suusu`s future rests on the outcome on this successful completion of this assignment.
Source: crunchyroll
